mapper.select: SELECT companyInfo ,langLocale ,companyName ,companyAddress ,companyTel ,companyeEmail ,corporateRegistNumber ,corporateType ,operatingHours ,customerCenterTel ,privacyOfficer ,copyright ,faxNumber ,ceo FROM company_info WHERE langLocale = #{langLocale}

SELECT COUNT(mainBbsNo) as totalCount from( SELECT A.mainBbsNo FROM MAIN_BBS A, SUB_BBS B, (SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) AS ROWNUM WHERE A.isPublic ='Y' AND A.bbsType1 = '1' AND A.mainBbsNo = B.mainBbsNo ORDER BY A.mainBbsNo DESC )TEMP_T

SELECT totalCount ,mainBbsNo ,bbsType1 ,bbsType2 ,writerNo ,title ,content ,viewCount ,createTime ,updateTime ,ROWNUM from( SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM board) AS totalCount ,A.mainBbsNo ,A.bbsType1 ,A.bbsType2 ,A.writerNo ,A.title ,A.content ,A.viewCount ,A.createTime ,A.updateTime ,(@RNUM := @RNUM + 1 ) AS ROWNUM FROM MAIN_BBS A, SUB_BBS B, (SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) AS ROWNUM WHERE A.isPublic ='Y' AND A.bbsType1 = '1' AND A.mainBbsNo = B.mainBbsNo ORDER BY A.mainBbsNo DESC )TEMP_T WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{S_SEQ} AND #{E_SEQ} ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC
SELECT A.mainBbsNo ,A.bbsType1 ,A.bbsType2 ,A.writerNo ,A.title ,B.content ,A.viewCount FROM main_bbs A, sub_bbs b WHERE A.isPublic ='Y' AND A.mainBbsNo = B.mainBbsNo AND A.mainBbsNo = #{mainBbsNo}
SELECT A.mainBbsNo ,A.bbsType1 ,A.bbsType2 ,A.writerNo ,A.title ,B.content ,A.viewCount FROM main_bbs A, sub_bbs B WHERE A.mainBbsNo = B.mainBbsNo AND A.isPublic = 'Y' AND A.mainBbsNo = #{mainBbsNo}

SELECT count(affiliateNo) as totalCount FROM affiliate WHERE 1 = 1
AND affiliateName LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{affiliateName}),'%')
AND affiliateAddress LIKE CONCAT('%',#{affiliateAddress},'%')
ORDER BY affiliateNo DESC

SELECT affiliateNo ,affiliateName ,affiliateAddress ,affiliateTel ,ROWNUM FROM( SELECT affiliateNo ,affiliateName ,affiliateAddress ,affiliateTel ,(@RNUM := @RNUM + 1 ) AS ROWNUM FROM affiliate , (SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) AS ROWNUM WHERE 1 = 1
AND affiliateName LIKE CONCAT('%',TRIM(#{affiliateName}),'%')
AND affiliateAddress LIKE CONCAT('%',#{affiliateAddress},'%')
ORDER BY affiliateNo DESC )TEMP_T WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN '1' AND '10' ORDER BY ROWNUM ASC
SELECT city_code, city_name FROM code_juso GROUP BY city_code, city_name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO main_bbs ( bbsType1 ,bbsType2 ,title ,content ,createTime ,updateTime ,rerv1 ,rerv2 ,rerv3 ,rerv4 ,rerv5 ,rerv6 ,isPublic ) VALUES ( '4' /* 제휴문의 구분자 값 */ ,#{bbsType2} /* 1 : 일반 회원 문의, 2 : 정회원 문의, 3 : 영업 관리자 문의 , 4 : 협력업체 문의, 5 : 대리점 문의, 6 : 지사 문의, 7 : 기타 제휴 문의 */ ,#{title} ,#{content} ,NOW() ,NOW() ,#{rerv1} /* 상호명 */ ,#{rerv2} /* 대표자명 */ ,#{rerv3} /* 주소 */ ,#{rerv4} /* 담당자 */ ,#{rerv5} /* 연락처 */ ,#{rerv6} /* 이메일 */ ,'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT AF.affiliateNo, AF.affiliateSerial, AF.affiliateCode, AF.affiliateName, AF.affiliateAddress, AF.affiliateTel, AF.affiliatePhone, AF.affiliateType, AF.affiliateComm, AF.giftCardPayRefundRate, AF.memberNo, AF.agencyNo, AF.recommenderNo, AF.affiliateStatus, AF.regType, AF.regAdminNo, AF.affiliateEmail, AF.greenPointAccStatus, AF.redPointAccStatus, AF.greenPointUseStatus, AF.redPointUseStatus, AF.createTime, AF.updateTime, M.memberEmail AS memberEmail, M.memberName AS memberName, M.memberPhone AS memberPhone, GP.pointAmount AS greenPointAmount, RP.pointAmount AS redPointAmount, MA.memberAddressNo, MA.memberNo, MA.nodeNo, MA.nodeType, MA.roadFullAddr, MA.roadAddrPart1, MA.roadAddrPart2, MA.addrDetail, MA.engAddr, MA.jibunAddr, MA.zipNo, MA.admCd, MA.rnMgtSn, MA.bdMgtSn, MA.lat, MA.lng, M2.memberName AS recommenderName, AG.agencyName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM affiliate_tid AS AT WHERE AF.affiliateNo = AT.affiliateNo) AS affiliateSerialCount, APR.paymentRouterNo, (SELECT paymentRouterType FROM payment_router WHERE paymentRouterNo = APR.paymentRouterNo) AS paymentRouterType, (SELECT paymentRouterName FROM payment_router WHERE paymentRouterNo = APR.paymentRouterNo) AS paymentRouterName, (SELECT paymentRouterCode FROM payment_router WHERE paymentRouterNo = APR.paymentRouterNo) AS paymentRouterCode FROM affiliate AS AF INNER JOIN member AS M ON (AF.memberNo = M.memberNo) INNER JOIN red_point AS RP ON (AF.memberNo = RP.memberNo) INNER JOIN green_point AS GP ON (AF.memberNo = GP.memberNo AND GP.nodeType ='5') LEFT OUTER JOIN member_address AS MA ON (AF.affiliateNo = MA.nodeNo AND MA.nodeType ='5') LEFT OUTER JOIN member AS M2 ON (AF.recommenderNo = M2.memberNo) LEFT OUTER JOIN agency AS AG ON (AF.agencyNo= AG.agencyNo) LEFT OUTER JOIN affiliate_payment_router AS APR ON (AF.affiliateNo= APR.affiliateNo) WHERE AF.affiliateNo = #{affiliateNo}
